title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6051.2 - Access procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6051.2 - Access procedure

State Regulations

Access to CHRI shall be accomplished by execution of a
written use and dissemination agreement between DCJS and the agency or
organization seeking access, or upon such terms and conditions as DCJS deems
necessary and appropriate. Except where otherwise provided by statute, DCJS
shall have sole discretion in determining the manner in which services provided
shall be furnished. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6051.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
